2From the end of the earthOr “the far reaches of the land” I call to you
You will lead me to a rock that is higher than I.
a strong tower from the enemy.
4Let me reside in your tent forever.
Let me take refuge under the covering of your wings. Selah
5For you, O God, you have heard my vows.
You have given me the heritage of those who fear your name.
6You will add days to the days of the king,
his years like those of many generations.Literally “a generation and a generation”
7May he liveOr “be enthroned” forever in the presence of God.

8So I will sing the praise of your name forever,
